name: Mr Owl Ate My Metal Worm
name_original: Mr Owl Ate My Metal Worm
description:
Time would not let Damien die. He uses his second chance to do what he does best. Win the heart of his true love. 

Every time you die, time is reversed. The ending depends on how many times you die.

Use Damien's revert time ability to doge enemy attacks.

This is a boss rush game with story.
